meaningMnemonic: The <radical>king</radical> of the <radical>flowers</radical> in the <radical>center</radical> (of England, if you remember) has a special <kanji>crystal</kanji>. The king crystal.
readingMnemonic: The king thinks everyone wants his <kanji>crystal</kanji> so he hides it in the giant <reading>a</reading>corn (えい) in the center of the flowers in England. There's a tiny hole in the bottom of the acorn, and that's where this crystal stays hidden.
